description:
Vov Screen Recorder is a handy tool to capture computer screen, i.e., record the ongoing activities on the screen.

Vov Screen Recorder is a handy tool to capture computer screen, i.e., record the ongoing activities on the screen. Using Vov Screen Recorder, you can record your desktop to create a how-to video to demonstrate working of a program, compile a products demo video for some client, record gameplay to post on social networks or record any other activity on the screen to share with friends or stakeholders, or to upload on video streaming services like YouTube. Vov Screen Recorder can capture a specific area or the full screen.

A lightweight super-simple screen recorder application to capture your desktop with one click. All popular video formats are supported such as AVI, QuickTime Video (MOV), MP4, MPEG, FLV, WMV, Matroska Video (MKV), and animated GIF. You can also include system audio or your voice using your microphone. Vov Screen Recorder includes and uses libraries from the FFmpeg project and it does not require any additional video codecs. It supports multiple monitors, software encoding and hardware acceleration for AMD, INTEL and NVIDIA GPUs (H264 and HEVC).

Key Features:
* Supports software and hardware encodings
* Supports multiple monitors
* Supports capturing microphone audio
* Multilingual interface
* Supports full screen or region/window recording
* Supports mouse pointer highlighting
* Supports capturing system sounds
* Installer and portable editions
